extendedInfo.description: First ever full true scale 3D RPG for Android!In a time of magic and dragons, become the hero you were meant to be and embark on the crusade of your destiny. Everything you expect in a solid action adventure RPG delivered in stunning 3D. Prepare To Quest!* The First of it's kind to introduce the innovative easy use multi-touch control scheme for touch screen mobile devices that allow full 3D freedom of movement plus 360 degree camera panning.* XPERIA PLAY Optimized [PlayStation Phone support].* 3 trainable skill lines. Become a better warrior, archer or mage. Some abilities available only to high trained skill lines.* Countless hours of gameplay.* 360 degree swimming! Go fishing for food! Even ride horses!* Detailed side quests.* 3D sound effect positioning.* Challenging bosses to defeat.* In-game cycles of real night and day on a readable 24 hour based time system. Some events based on night and day.* Multiple damage types including slashing, blunt, piercing, fire, ice, and energy within a unique combat resist system. Certain creatures are more resistant or vulnerable to certain attacks.* High quality sound effects and original music soundtracks each with individual volume controls.* Multiple lands and caverns to explore with many secrets to uncover.* Single target and area effect skills available for both melee and magic lines.* Easy to learn combat system with auto-face targeting.* Balanced economy system. Visit shops. Buy and sell items.* Right and left handed joystick and controls option.* In-game help tutorial. Go to Inventory - Options - Help for more instructions.* Customizable hot keys. Arrange skills in any order.* 3 game slots to save multiple player's adventures.* Large variety of mystical creatures* Multiple languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Polish and Korean.

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Yes, as someone said below, there are a lot of similarities between Crusade of Destiny and Earth & Legend... but there are more than enough differences to make them both fun. The fact that one guy seems to have done both games pretty much single-handed blows my mind and frankly puts a lot of software \"giants\" to shame. Keep these games coming and I will not only keep buying them I will plead with anyone who will listen to do the same. This is the sort of game designer that actually DESERVES our support!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Good game play, fun, i love this game. Runs super smooth on LG Connect 4G.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crusade of destiny good game but...
reviews.comment: J\'ai terminer crusade of destiny apres 17 heures de gameplay. C\'est un jeu incroyablement bon sur xperia play. Comme un vrai bon rpg, ce jeu n\303\251cessite assez de patience, et aussi qui est tr\303\250s tr\303\250s TRES r\303\251petitif. Quelques bugs mais rien de grave.Le seul petit probl\303\250me avec ce jeu cest que earth and legend est tout simplement trop bon comparer a ce jeu et que les objets sp\303\251ciale sont difficile a trouv\303\251.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fabulous game
reviews.comment: it\'s really nice game i prefer DA games than gameloft.Go ahead & MAKE games like these so,our support will be with u:)

reviews.title: B+
reviews.comment: Graphics are very good for a phone game.  gameplay is pretty solid if a little grindy.  i would\'ve liked to have seen more quests and more detail in the landscapes.  will be looking forward to a sequel
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Free roaming, in a quite extensive, and interesting world. Graphics are,\"HD,oii very colorfull, and attractive, if simple, and a little comical, completely 3d. With fun and challenging charectory developement. It\'s a winner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Amazing! Love it This game is amazing! Runs great on my Samsung Galaxy Tab. Great graphics and fun to play. This is a real rpg! 5 stars. Thx!!

reviews.title: Basic but well implemented
reviews.comment: The  setting and story are pure clich\303\251, there are some interface quirks and the 2d character art is odd but a full 3D rpg on my phone? That is a win!

reviews.comment: Ugh I love this game to death but I don\'t know what elf ore does and what it means when it says u can\'t use raw if someone can leave a message ill read it but for now I don\'t know what to do plz help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Entertaining and alot of content. Comical graphics and sometimes confusing quests  but overall great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat Rpg
reviews.comment: It was nice finding a good RPG for my phone.  The graphics are good and the gameplay is fluid.  Also the boss fights are not that hard.  Just as any other RPG, you will spend time xp\'ing and farming money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brenna
reviews.comment: Awesome little RPG very addictive. Just finished it. Love the Elf armor very flashy lol. It froze a couple times and I had to press the icon 2 and 3 times sometimes to get  it to start. But all and all well worth the money. Using a Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this game. Don\'t listen to the reviews and try it for your self. Way better graphics than PL and a nice break from mmos. Worth the five bucks. No lag, or issues so far.  GJ dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was great until now. I can\'t load any saved game. It says there aren\'t any. Uninstalled until I can save my progress.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Stunning game to look at, yet doesn\'t sufferany slowdown on my Galaxy Ace. Controls and camera are flawless, and the design of the elf-people is very cute and endearing. The game requires a LOT of grinding which can sometimes be a chore but other than that a great rpg.
reviews.author: Katana Dan

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: I have an Optimus p500 with 2.3 android (un-rooted) and this game runs pretty good considering the phone only has a 600mhz processor.  It lags a little bit when in a populated area.  I have searched all over the market for a decent 3D RPG for this phone and by the looks of it, this game is as good as it gets.  Earth and Legend is a no-go for this phone, way too laggy.  Unless you root your phone.  That aside, its a standard rpg experiance, leveling, grinding, skills, quests and all that jazz. I have only played the first area so far and I am happy with this purchase.  Only suggestion I would make to developers is to add a mini-map with quest icons or trackers.  I will update if the game gets progressively worse lag-wise.  Again, this lag is from my device, not the game itself.  Oh and the controls are pretty good too, in my opinion.  Cheers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m happy
reviews.comment: Game runs good no glitches. Exploring I saw a mob lv 50+ 3d graphics which at first I thought didn\'t look good but improved majorly as I went.  Tips jump in well  go fishing  its the easiest way to get hp restorer. While standing in shop don\'t click the clerk but click top right pic to sell items. Also at lv 9 buy town map go to goblin lair. Which is very nice.  Anyway I have played many mmorps. (pwi) this rpg game is  worth 5 dollars glad I got it. Hope this helps and if u get it have fun gaming  ;)
reviews.author: Terri Foster

reviews.title: Needs more content
reviews.comment: I would like to see more quests more types of enemys with more enemy lvls so lvling isn\'t so boring killing same enemy over and over... The type of buyable items could be more than just armors weps potions.... Would be nice to see more active npcs, runs great on my thunderbolt droid the camera goes through walls in dungions and doesn\'t go up or down, just side to side. Grass graphics could be better and not so patchy. I love this game its a lot of fun, just offering up advice on how to make it better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crusade of Perpetual Grinding
reviews.comment: A poorly developed rpg that misses the mark on all accounts save one: Grinding for character levels. The story is shallow, the graphics are suprisingly blocky and devoid of detail, and the gameplay is monotonous.  The game\'s barely existent story literally cannot be furthered without repeated boring combat to attain enough strength to fight the next mediocre crop of enemies.  As a free game, this style of gameplay would be passable at best. Fun for a few hours and boring the next.Playtime 6.5 hours. Thanks.
reviews.author: Mark Toutant
